name: Cats Fishing 2
description:
Created for a school project: a digital game based of a board game made for the same course.

Cats Fishing 2 is a single-player digital adaptation of its namesake. The player takes control of a cat aiming to collect as many fish as possible before time runs out. Players will do this by traversing the labyrinthine map in search of fish. However, they must carefully avoid other competing cats and bringing the fish back home before the timer runs out.
